## Protocol.DOMSnapshot.GetSnapshotRequest.includeUserAgentShadowTree property

Whether to include UA shadow tree in the snapshot (default false).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
includeUserAgentShadowTree?: boolean;
```
